content.detailedDescription:
Pulling up to a party at a house facing north @ gilbert rd and guadalupe.
got out of the car and just looked up and saw them.I do not know why i decided to do that.It was no doubt nothing i am used to seeing.We watched 5 of them traveling from north to south in a straight line.Amber colored orbs one was more red it was the last one to fade out.I think they are awesome.My friend said he could see smaller objects flying next to the bigger ones.
content.summary: 5 amber colored lights dec 31 st 2013

content.detailedDescription: On new year's eve i was at spanish fork, utah just outside spanish fork canyon west of the golf course celebrating the new year at a friends house. shortly after midnight i went outside the front door which faces north. one friend was out there with his wife and some of the children. i looked at the direction they were staring and say multiple red starlike objects in the northern horizon. i saw there were at least 4 of them that were spaced out evenly and seemd to form and vertictal line. they were reddish orange and i saw their glow begin to fade out starting with the bottom one working its way up until there was only one left. when this happened another would appear to the bottom right. as it started to drift upward, it would split into two and both lights would rise together. this pattern repeated itself 2-3 times. once, the lights ran out and one object appeared which split into 3 lights. the lights arranged themselves so that they formed a triangle. i went and got the rest of the people there that night. they saw all of this happened. but most of them ridiculed me and said it was fireworks. i have never seen fireworks randomly appear in the sky and appear to fly/hover and arrange themselves into triangles while not falling back down. i stayed out there and lights continued to flash in the northern horizon but also began to appear in the eastern sky but much bigger appearing to be much closer. only one object at a time appeared in the eastern sky. these would fly in a southern direction emitting no sound and blink out soon after. finally the lights started appearing. i went back inside but after 20 mins i felt a strong urge to return. i went back outside and saw nothing for a few minutes. when i was about to go back in i saw one much closer than the ones before. this one was in the eastern sky again but i could see a little more detail. there was a solid red light. above it i could see like a red-orange mist and it look like it was being emitted form the solid red light. maybe like a flame. no sound. this one hovered southeast towards the windmills at the mouth of spanish fork canyon. as it flew away, the solid red light at the bottom began to fade out and did. but the misty part on top was still there except it changed to the shape of a sphere. it went farther and farther away until i could no longer see it. throughout the whole thing i tried to take videos or pictures. but through the camera i could only see one object at a time with very poor detail so i decided it would not be worth taking pictures or videos. i took one picture but it showed nothing but black sky. my son actually came out while the last one was hovering and started crying after seeing my reaction to it and i held him and we watched it disappear together. i know there is no physical evidence. i just wanted to share my experience. thank you.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Went outside just after midnight. person pointed to red lights in the northern sky. they were in a vertical lin formation. blinked out beginning with bottom one. once there was one left another would appear to the left and split into two and did more.....

content.detailedDescription: It was right after midnight when my room mates and i noticed 4 red glowing lights flying in a strange yet perfect formation just below the cloud line. at first we thought it was airplanes but it was too close to one another. they came into sight at the same time but the first one was speeding ahead and disappeared into the clouds. the last three, still in perfect formation, gradually followed suit, disappearing into the clouds as well. we were shocked and can't really explain what we just witnessed.
content.summary: 4 red glowing lights flying in a strange yet perfect formation just below the cloud line.

content.detailedDescription: Took dog out after fireworks stopped and while waiting on dog noticed  a white light passing above me several hundred feet up , orb like , traveling silently above me low enough to illuminate the misty clouds. some times i could clearly see the round white light then it would illuminate the clouds as it passed through them. it was completely quiet. there was a light sprinkle coming down. i watched it until it dimmed from the clouds as it went out of view. not a plane , happened just north of macdill afb.
content.summary: White orb

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 11:16 i was going south on el camino past clear lake middle school when a light emitting red-orange orb was spotted hovering to my back left a few miles to the north before slowly moving ne at a slow speed. driver of vehicle saw the same object. objects brightness rapidly faded upon passing the intersection of el camino and el dorado heading south on el camino until object was a pin point source and shortly thereafter, not visible. called family member at 11:18pm who witnessed two red-orange orbs to the ne. family member saw both objects maintaining equal distance from each other, slowly gained altitude, one going above clouds followed by the other a few seconds after (distance between objects did not change during siting). objects brightness did not change when observed at a constant distance. not a firework.
content.summary: Two red-orange light emitting orbs hovered a few miles north from clear lake middle school. both objects maintained equal distance and slowly gained altitude and went above clouds. objects brightness did not change. not a firework.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the first object at around 7pm. i was pulling out of my driveway and saw a star jolt side to side. the other passengers in the car saw the object as well, and it did appear to jolt to them. it was glowing orange very brightly. then after a couple of hours(10:30pm), i was sitting in the car, waiting for my sister to come out of a new years party that she was at (we were party hopping) and i looked up at the stars; it was a very clear night. then as i glanced over at the home which she was coming out of, i saw 2 very bright lights (like a light on top of a cell phone tower) flying very slowly at a 30 degree angle going up, flying north. the lights pulsed bright orange. i grabbed my camera in an attempt to film the objects, and filmed the scene from here on, but it is hard to see the objects in the video. they were flying side by side. after watching them for about 1 minute they just disappeared; then 3 reappeared just below where the 2 just disappeared. the 3 lights flew in a triangle formation quicker than the 2 that i had seen before. they were flying north in the west sky. i then thought that i was seeing meteors or jets of some type. i looked across the sky and saw an individual light flying north in the east sky, but then it just stopped. it sat in one spot for about 2 minutes and then a glowing object was released from it but the object stopped glowing after about 100 feet of descent. then the object jolted side to side very quickly and continued to fly north for another 20 seconds before it disappeared. later that night(11:30pm), i saw a very bright orange star move suddenly across part of the sky and stop in a formation of stars that appeared to form a v. it stayed there in the top corner as long as i checked (still there at 1am). 
i really do not know what these were, but i want to know. i don't know how they disappeared in a cold, clear night like it was. it is very odd to me. i did not drink alcohol; it was not an hallucination.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sitting in car and saw 8 lights; 3 in triangle formation, 1 released an object, 4 hovered and zig-zagged in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Just after midnight on new years eve i looked out an upstairs bathroom window to see if i could see some fireworks. looking north east over the hills i saw a bright orange light heading toward my location. i thought it may have been an airliner. but the light was flickering and not strobing. i went outside to get a better look and saw two more lights moving along with it traveling in the same direction. then i saw a 4th light. i grabbed some binoculars to get a better look but could not identify any mechanical features. the lights moved rapidly crossing high over head and then faded out as if ascending out of sight.
content.summary: Just after midnight whitnissed 4 bright red-orange lights traveling from northeast to southwest

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in a hotel room in burlington ontario, right beside lake ontario.  we were waiting to celebrate new year's eve from 2013 into 2014.  i looked out the hotel window and saw an orange orb slowly flying from the west in front of our hotel and to the east.  i called over my husband to the window, and then over the course of perhaps one to two minute intervals five more exactly the same orange flying orbs came from the exact same location in the west and flew on the same path towards the east.  i thought i had record on my phone to videotape but i guess i did not record.  we were completely unable to determine what these six orange flying orbs were.  amazing!!!
thank you
barbara
content.summary: From the east at one minute to midnight new years eve one by one six orange flying orbs flew from the west to the east exact same path.  absolutely not airplanes or fireworks!

content.detailedDescription:
1. outside at new years eve celebrating
2. thought at first they were helicopters for news reporting of phila celebrations
3. live near airport so used to seeing flights of diff aircraft, these orbs or crafts (first set of 4) came in from the west silently and slowly in a straight line with purpose.  not like anything i'd ever seen  before. moved in silence (no thrum of blades as in copters, no engine sounds)stacked at first horizontally then on top of each other when 2 more joined from same direction.  one more craft or orb was larger and slightly different color than the rest, it joined facing the grouped others. entire group of 7 hovered for a good minute or two then disappeared. 
5. a holy crap moment for sure.  family and neighbors all witnessed.  tried to take pics on camera, batteries died.  pics taken by family friend captured last three.
content.summary: First three light balls or craft entered view from phila area traveling east, stacked and hovered, more joined one was larger/brighte

content.detailedDescription:
This morning, jan. 1, 2014, 12:30-12:45am six friends and i witnessed a single, reddish, non-strobing, slow moving object over american fork, utah, our vantage being one town west in lehi, utah.  the object appeared to randomly drop numerous(40-50) flare type objects.  the dropped objects varied in brightness, some dropped steadily down, some seemed to hover in place.  dropped objects appeared to "burn out" before reaching the ground, making it difficult to tell if they ever did in fact reach the ground.  the reddish light appeared to remain at the same altitude throughout the event, but traveled south at a slow but steady pace.  no discernible noises were ever heard emanating our direction.  the object moved behind cloud cover about 15 minutes after first sighting.

almost exactly two years ago, a local news station(abc4) broadcasted a story along with videos of an event that happened over the same town(american fork).  the video was shot by a man in the air force who was stumped as to what the object could be.  what we witnessed was the exact same type of event.
content.summary: Single, non-strobing light ejecting bright white flare type objects

content.detailedDescription:
As a former pilot i always look to the sky

at 6:05pm i walked out my front door in ripon california which faces south.  my wife and i were leaving to visit friends. my wife was on her cell phone talking to her friend as we were running late. i looked up to the north over my roof and saw what i thought was an airliner on fire. it was an incredible site and then i thought it was a missile launch - but from where? there was no sound at all
this was maybe 10 seconds as it raced across the horizon
i immediately noticed a 2nd, 3rd, and then a fourth all in the same direction moving at a very high rate of speed and climbing. the direction was from north to south with 2 of the objects changing direction 
all four objects appeared to ascend out into outer space

the event lasted long enough for her to tell her friend who was already on the phone with her. her friend ran outside to see the last 2 objects. they live approx onequarter of a mile to the north of us

i am really hoping someone can help explain what happened
content.summary: 4 objects ascending w/ direction change. i initially thought a passenger jet was one fire

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and her friend were walking about 10 p.M. and called me frantically telling me to come outside to see the lights in the sky.  by the time i got there they were gone.  she managed to video tape a small part of the event but stopped because she didn't feel she was getting anything.  here is a synopsis of the event in her words:

"there were three large balls of light that hovered in the sky. one was very slowly hovering up and down, above and below the treetops in the distance. the others remained stationary for a while until the leftmost one sluggishly moved off to the left, away from the rest. a little bit after that happened, another one slowly showed itself to the right of the two that remained. in the video, i saw twinkling that i did not see with the naked eye."

in the video her father and i downloaded from her lg motion cell phone, we saw some interesting artifacts not visible to her or her friend at the time.  although the video is short, there are a lot of curious bits in it notably to the left of the first light.  the objects have a strange shape to them and do not appear to be lighted, but seen from light the balls cast.  

please let us know if anyone else saw these or what you think they may be.  it was enough of an event to alarm the girls, who walk outside at night a lot, and was definitely not the usual aircraft we see flying into hartsfield jackson.    these lights, according to my daughter, were extremely bigger than aircraft lights we see on our nightly walks.

i am including a copy of the video.  it is not retouched or faked and is straight off of her cell phone.  

thank you.
content.summary: Three balls of light, very large hovering.

content.detailedDescription: while waiting to give a friend a ride to a new years party, i was in my car in front front of his house located in dale city, va. i was listening to the radio and happened to notice something out of the drivers side window that caught my eye. it was a almost triangular shaped form glowing amber in color. it travelled vertically at first and kind of briefly hovered. it was pretty slow and deliberate.It almost appeared to have windows with the glowing coming from within it. the closest thing i could relate its resemblance to, would be the traditional floating asian lanterns that are lit and released into the sky. i tried to video the form with my phone, but the video is not clear. and it appears farther away in the video than it was to my location. i shot an azimuth with a phone app in the direction of the object and at approximately 10:20pm the object was a. 215 degrees sw.
content.summary: Observed a triangular shaped amber glowing object above dale city, va. around 10:20pm on 12/31/13 it was at exactly 215 degrees sw and flew vertically then horizontally

content.detailedDescription: We' saw 4 bright orange orbs flying in formation new year's eve over thevmonterey bay in northetn califorknia for approximately 2 minutes.. they came from the south east heading norhhwest then turned due south. the orange lights were very bright then  faded  out as they turned south. they  were about at 5,000 ft.
content.summary: 4 bright orange  orbs flying in formation from the south east

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on the porch of our house facing west when from out of the ne sky we saw 2 lights one apparently on the same path going sw and about 15 seconds later 2 more lights/fireballs followed the same path. it was probably about 1 min from the time we saw the first lights that started red in color changing to orange, yellow, then blue to white and finally disappeared. they flew in a mostly straight direction but seamed to change to more westerly towards the end where they disappeared. did not seem like other meteors i have seen, they did not seem to loose elevation, like they were flying in the air rather than falling.  i have never seen anything like this except on tv/internet videos. i would love to know what they were.
content.summary: 4 lights in same path started red in color ending white and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I went out side after hearing what sound to be gun shots but i said it's only 8:53pm why would anyone be shooting i look up in the sky and there is what looks to be like balls of fire ascending up words in the sky there is about 6 balls total before i go get my camera 3 already disappear and 3 are still there until they disappear as if they left the atmosphere.
content.summary: Like balls of fire flying up there was 3 then 3 after that

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were outside watching neighborhood fireworks on new years. we noticed 6-7 bright red lights to the north. they were moving very slowly. the lights slowly disappeared as if moving away. more lights continued to appear as others disappeared (4-5 lights). this continued for 3-4 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 7 bright red / yellow lights moving slowly and then slowly dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: Its the first minuets of new years day. im about a mile away from home after work.  i look up to the north west and i notice 3 glowing orbs traveling at fairly quick speeds heading southeast. i called my wife and told her to look outside and she could see them as well. more kept coming, about 6-8 in all. then they would just disappear into the snowy sky. this occurred over about an 8 minute time period.
content.summary: Hovering glowing

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out in the back yard. i looked up at the fireworks going off in the neighborhood and noticed the object. i had no idea what it could be because of the movement pattern. first it hovered then suddenly it glided to the right. it again hovered, then glided back to its original location. once again it hover, they glided to the left. it was cold out, so i went back inside and did not continue to watch. it was not frightening; i just felt puzzled because of the way it moved.
content.summary: Hovered the glided with repeated pattern

content.detailedDescription: Green explosion in the sky. object descended to earth. similar to fireworks, but upside down. seems close enough to assume it landed around ou campus or even further east around lake thunderbird i was driving south on i-35 southbound. this happened about 11pm.  i know 2 others who seen the the same event (from different places)
content.summary: Green explosion in sky, downward descencion

content.detailedDescription: New years at home. lots of fireworks going off all night in neighborhood. watched ball drop in ny via tv then went outside on deck to say happy new year and watch firework. there was large fw display over wando river near hwy 41. that is when we noticed the floating orbs seeming to be traveling over the wando river going west. high in the sky. looked near the flight path we have seen jets take but not nearly as high. looked like they were blinking or pulsating. they floated near each other in a path going west then disappeared into clouds. never saw this any time before. we were amazed. we could her our neighbors out on their decks partying so they must have seen them too. i have never made a sighting report before but it was real.
content.summary: Orbs appearing floating in night sky traveling west disappear into clouds

content.detailedDescription: Driving home after new years we noticed a formation of lights right above the horizon line. we pulled over immediately to observe. the levels of elevation were varying. no blinking lights, appeared to be much larger than any man made explanation ( ex. chinese lanterns) plus the lights did not flicker. they were deep orange fluctuating to light yellow. we knew immediately we were seeing something we couldn't explain. one by one the lights disappeared until the last one which seemed stationary at this point eventually did the same.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: First noticed 7 lights in an askew formation, the pack moved together unwavering unblinking, disappeared one at a time.

content.detailedDescription: It's new years eve ( last night ) at around 23:15 est and i'm spending a quiet evening at home with my wife. she was asleep on the couch and i was watching tv from my recliner. our dog was huddled next to my wife on the couch obviously not liking the sound of fireworks in the distance. rather bored, i decided step out to the back patio for a cigarette. i opened the screen door as i always do to flick my ashes onto the lawn. i could hear the muffled explosions of fireworks off in the distance but saw no aerial displays as i did on independence day. about half way through my cigarette i heard a helicopter approaching from the south. i leaned forward and looked up. sure enough, it was a helicopter flying overhead in a south to north direction. nothing unusual. there is a small municipal airport in the town just north of me and it was heading in that direction. i see many aircraft coming and going on any given day or night. it was a minute or so later that i noticed something unusual in the sky approaching from the east. at this point i stepped out onto my lawn to get a better look. the object had an orange, fire like glow and was flying below cloud level in an east to westerly direction. the weather on this evening was heavily overcast with low clouds but no rain. i was amazed as it passed over me slightly to the south at a steady speed of maybe 100 - 110 knots. no unusual maneuvers were observed, the object stayed on a straight and steady course. it had none of the strobe lights that i'm accustomed to seeing on a planes wing tips and tail, and no bright white landing light(s) were visible. the bright orange-reddish glow of the object was beautiful. it also emitted a short flickering flame from the tail. i lost sight of it as it passed to the west due to my roof obstructing my view. at this point i ran to the front of my house and watched it once again as it slowly disappeared into the western sky, still maintaining a steady height, speed, and course. there was never any sound. no prop noise, no jet exhaust noise. dead silence. i am a retired u.S.A.F. security policeman and vietnam veteran. i have seen many different types of aircraft in my life time, but never anything like this.
content.summary: Fireball coming from east - moving westerly - gradually disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I am on the cell phone at 6:55 am with my sister, as i look out the window i noticed a bright light, large, hovering. i waited before i said anything to my sister, and as i was speaking to her, i took my nikon 10-22x50 3.8 at 10x binoculars and began to look at the object. it was like a large glowing ball of light. it just hovered, i waited to see if it was a plane as i live right under heavy plane traffic as they are about to descend towards laguardia air port. the planes come very low so you can clearly see its a plane, sometimes so close you can see the windows in miniature fashion. the light was less than a mile away as it hovered over bronx state hospital and after a bit it moved right in a very slow fashion and then just hovered for another 5-10 minutes.You can tell in the bright lights there was some inner core that appeared like a solid shape. it just hovered as the light shone brightly. you can see it with a naked eye because bronx state is so close to my home less then a mile away, walking distance from my house. it hovered then it just disappeared. it was not a plane, not a helicopter, there are plenty of those around due to the highways and local traffic reports on the television. so i know the clear difference this was a very very unusual ball of of light with a structure within its core> i was sharing this with my sister as i put the phone on speaker so i can can hold the binoculars more steady. it just hovered there...And when it moved it was so slow..Very slow. and as i said before it stopped stood in place, was emitting light like a star but it was closer and bright as it was below cloud level. then is was just gone! in an instant. about 7:16-7:18 am it appeared 3 military jets began fly byes...
content.summary: Round ball of light hovers, moves nw and just hovers for about 10 mins

content.detailedDescription: I was outside enjoying the sunset & i went inside and got my camera when i came out it had turned dark like time speedup, like i lost 30minutes or so? so i was on my deck waiting for the moon to rise & as i was looking off to the east,southeast a cloud that was on the horizon became very bright & i started taking pics not knowing what i was looking at& with in about 8-9minutes this object came out of the cloud glowing yellow to white really bright. as it was happening i keep telling myself thats got to be the moon but there was no way because it came out of the cloud, it rose-up,it was round like the moon but the moon does not come out of a clouds right? in the pics you can see the cloud hase touchs the object like smoke, you can diffently see the object was coming out of the cloud& the cloud is square in shape which until i looked at the pics i had no idea it has a defined shape.After awhile as i watched it rise out of the said cloud it disappeared into a large system of clouds that had came out of nowhere. it was amazing to say the least. if anyone can explain what i saw please do, but until then i know what i saw & i have pics to prove it.I just wish i video taped it. you ask why i did'nt  i had no idea what i was seeing & it had me mezmorized. like i said i think it had some control of time because what i thought was a few seconds was 8-9 minutes & the only reason i know that is my camera.Thank you
content.summary: As i observed the object appeared out of what i thought was a cloud but after looking over the film im not sure what i saw. i thought it was the moon but it was way to bright & the cloud it came out of was square. i've got pics, thats were it looks square

content.detailedDescription:
Visiting the family for the holidays

right after the countdown for 2014 new years several minutes of hearing fireworks, gunshots, etc. then out of nowhere you heard a series of sonic booms. i was already outside when this started happening and looked up when i started hearing the sonic booms. i started seeing in the distance lights lighting up the sky (materializing with each sonic boom) then they started getting in formation while staying stationary in the sky. not like a plane where they are always moving. by then all the family members started witnessing it. after awhile the lights started leaving in their own separate direction. 

with so many people out there that has already numerously recorded moments like this with all similar experiences there was no doubt in our minds in what we were really seeing. now what did shock us was that when this was taking place we were also hearing the night filled with echoes of police sirens, etc. giving us the impression that this was causing somewhat a panic for the local community. but after calling it in with the local authorities the told us no one called in with similar reports.

we are sure we were not the only ones that seen this! this was way to large not to be seen!

what a way to start the new year off for 2014.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Each ufo appeared after a series of sonic booms

content.detailedDescription: My daughter saw it first, then i went to see it out of our window and it moved ever so slow then a little faster then it turned and disappeared and reappeared in opposite place,it effected our radio no stations available, and it just moved from one spot to anthor, it was seen earlier that day it went from east to west really fast and it actually reflected off the mountains then it was gone until we saw it that night. it was not a star,nor a satellite nor a comet or anything like that it scared us and our animals were cowering in the house like they sensed something was not right. we have had cattle mutilation in this county a few years back. but back to this night the object just disappeared and have not seen it since. we have a pic i will download on the laptop tomorrow and add it to this.
content.summary: Bright red object moved slowly then dissapear show up in oppisite place

content.detailedDescription:
At work having cigarette aprox. 4 or 5 minutes after new year midnight

looking at new years fire works and saw objects , one ablut a minute or two after first sighting

airplane but quickly realized not plane, had coworker look and he seen them also 

no clue , then eventual wondered about flare ballon

curiosity feelings

lost sight as they ether elevated or faded 
first one went away after second one and i was focused on new one

doubt flare balloon as came in air from northwest and slight movements not apparent to air currents
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red to reddish orange object pencil lead in western sky 45 degree over horizon

content.detailedDescription:
New years eve- lit off some fireworks and saw a glowing amber/white light headed directly towards our home.  first thought it was a helicopter, or some type of police surveillance for the illegal fireworks, but this flew in a direct flight path and then hovered over our home (and naturally those of our neighbors) for exactly 18 minutes.  it did not make a sound.  no helicopter, no plane.  not a single sound could be heard.  the fireworks had already come to an end, and yet this thing kept hovering overhead.  not a sound.  it finally began to move back the way it came.  as it flew overhead again, another one appeared from out of nowhere - flew close to the one we had been watching and it too moved in a southern direction for less than 5 seconds when it completely disappeared from sight.  the stars are visible, even aircraft are visible, there is no cloud coverage - and this glowing orb flew directly towards us, hovered for 18 minutes, then went back the way it came.  
we have not been drinking, are not on drugs - we're in our 60's.  we simply went out on our back patio to watch the fireworks and listen to the revelers.  it was the strangest sensation to watch this glowing 'thing' flying directly towards us - and as i said, it didn't make a sound.  it just hovered overhead.  it wasn't even flying at the altitude a helicopter or single engine plane would fly.  it felt as though it were very close.  we felt kind of uncertain - like what's our government up to now?  but as we watched it move back in the direction it came - another one appeared from out of nowhere - came close to the one we were watching - and then vanished.  we kept our eye on the one that hovered over our home - until it seemed it to be at least a mile or so away and then it too vanished from sight.  the lights were very obvious when it was coming towards us, and when it was leaving.  we never took our eyes off it - and then it simply vanished. was thinking it might be a drone, but reading the postings from those on the east coast, leaves one to wonder what's going on.
content.summary: Flying from s to n -glowing amber/white light - flying directly over house - hovering 18 minutes - then heading back south. another appeared from se-then vanished

content.detailedDescription: Hi, my girlfriend and i were standing outside our apartment in tigard, oregon watching the neighbors fireworks, when we looked westward and say three orange balls of light that were drifting in the sky.  they soon faded one by one and dissapeared.  i personally think they could have been flares, but why and from what i do not know.  my girlfriend thinks it was quite peculiar and wanted to know what she saw as do i.  if anyone can shed some "light" on this, there opinion or analysis is welcome.
content.summary: Three orange balls of light slowly traveling across portion of sky, dissipating
